Reviews.Title: Do NOT buy!!!
Reviews.Author: FrancesG
Reviews.Content: I just bought this camera. The little clicker thing that is supposed to scroll through pictures on your camera is stuck. Then I tried uploading the photos. It needed a driver that is no longer available. There is no way to retrieve the pictures using just Windows. It is a useless piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: This camera rocks!!
Reviews.Author: A. mcnally
Reviews.Content: Love this ill cam.i had an expensive Fuji but this is so much easier and tiny...love it.cant say enough good things!

Reviews.Title: best camera ever!
Reviews.Author: V. Saengkeo "Tori-Ohki"
Reviews.Content: The camera is easy to use and the pictures are good enough. Photos taken with this camera even looked better than other photos taken with a camera of higher megapixels. I love the very small size also-- fits easily in a purse or jacket pocket. It is just what I needed.
